actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 as amended.
short_title: Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act Amendments

summary.text: Farm Labor Registration Act Amendments - Amends the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 to revise the definition of a "farm labor contractor" and to define "transport" and "immediate family" for purposes of such Act.

titles.title: Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act Amendments
A bill to amend the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 as amended.
